name: Buy it now!
description:
You just can't finish this game. Show me if you can.

Try to complete this game to the end! Not everyone will be able to pass difficult obstacles!


Jump over, step over, dodge and much more. Show your skills!


in This Game:

1. Huge difficulties

2. Handsome peasant

3. The voice of a cute Russian girl at the end

4. Spikes

5.And other...




If you find bugs in the game...

There are no bugs in the game, okay?
